SUBSCRIPTIONS.TITLE: Subscriptions - User Profile - Taiga
SUBSCRIPTIONS.PLAN_STARTING: Free until April 30, 2016 - Billing starts May 1, 2016
SUBSCRIPTIONS.PRIVATE_PROJECTS_LIMIT: Up to {{number}} private projects + Unlimited public projects
SUBSCRIPTIONS.MEMBERS_LIMIT: Up to {{number}} members per private project
SUBSCRIPTIONS.CONTACT_SUBSCRIBE: Subscribe to this plan by contacting us at support@taiga.io
SUBSCRIPTIONS.MAX_PRIVATE_PROJECTS: Do you want to create more private projects? Upgrade your plan!

HELP.WHY: Why are we recommending this plan?
HELP.NO_PROJECTS: You currently have no private projects, so for you we would recommend the {{name}} plan.
HELP.FEW_PROJECTS: You have {{private_num}} private projects. The plan that fits for current needs is the {{name}} plan.
HELP.NUM_PROJECTS: You have {{private_num}} private projects and {{public_num}} public projects. The plan that fits for current needs is the {{plan}} plan.
HELP.NUM_PROJECTS_CUSTOM: You have {{private_num}} private projects and {{public_num}} public projects. The plan that fits for current needs is the Custom plan.
HELP.SUBSCRIBE: When you subscribe to a plan now, you ensure continued access to your projects and you will not be charged for your first month until April 30, 2016.
HELP.UPGRADE: Making changes to your Subscription plan is easy and can be done at any time
HELP.ACTIVATION: Paid Subscriptions will be activated on April 30th. If you have more than 1 private project, subscribing to a plan now, ensures you have a continued access to your projects. You will not be charged for your first month until April 30, 2016
HELP.PAYMENT: If you have more than 1 private project and you have not subscribed to a payment plan, your private projects will be temporarily blocked. But, do not worry, they will not be deleted. Once you confirm a subscription plan, they will be accesible again.
HELP.PUBLIC: Remember that public projects don't count toward paid plans.

PLANS_SELECTOR.TITLE: What plan do you need?
PLANS_SELECTOR.FREE: All plans are free until 30th April
PLANS_SELECTOR.CONTACT: Do you need more than 25 users on a given project? We have custom plans for enterprises. Contact us at support@taiga.io

DOWNGRADE.TITLE: Downgrade
DOWNGRADE.REASON: You exceed the number of private projects allowed by this plan. Your current plans allows up to {{projects}} private projects and {{members}} members per private project. To change to the {{plan}} plan you should make the following changes
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS: If you have more than {{projects}} private projects
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION1: Do no exceed {{projects}} private projects and set the others as public
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION2: Keep {{projects}} private projects and delete the others
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION3: Or a combination of the above options
DOWNGRADE.MORE_MEMBERS: If you have more than {{members}} members per private project
DOWNGRADE.MORE_MEMBERS_OPTION1: Have a maximum of {{members}} members in all your private projects

SELECT_PLAN.TITLE: Subscribe to a plan
SELECT_PLAN.SUBTITLE: You will not be charged until April, 30th. Then enjoy Taiga for free on us
SELECT_PLAN.INTERVAL: Starting April 30, 2016 How would you like to pay?

BLOCKED_PROJECT.TO_UNBLOCK_CHECK_YOUR_PLAN: To unblock your projects you must subscribe the plan that best fit your needs
